text: Automaniac was a TV show hosted by former professional wrestler Bill Goldberg. In each episode, Goldberg told the story of a particular type of vehicle: its origins, its designers, etc. The show aired on Wednesdays at 11 PM EST/10 PM CST on The History Channel and was canceled in August 2005. == External links == * The History Channel page for Automaniac Category:Automotive television series Category:History (American TV channel) original programming
title: Automaniac
